meanings.definition: A person who specializes in ethics.
meanings.sent1: The ethician guided the group on moral dilemmas.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired an ethician to ensure ethical practices.
meanings.sent3: The ethician joked that even robots need ethics lessons.
meanings.sent4: She was the ethician of the family, always advising on right and wrong.
meanings.sent5: The ethician's wisdom shone through in every decision made.
